import React from "react"; import './user-profile.css' import ChangePassword from './change-password.jsx' import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardFooter, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; import { Component } from "react"; class UserProfile extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { isDisplayFormChangePass: false, user : props.user } } OpenForm = () =>{ this.setState({ isDisplayFormChangePass : !this.state.isDisplayFormChangePass }); } onCloseForm =() =>{ this.setState({ isDisplayFormChangePass : !this.state.isDisplayFormChangePass }); } render(){ var {isDisplayFormChangePass} = this.state; var show = isDisplayFormChangePass ? : ''; return ( <>
{show}

*******************
); } } export default UserProfile;
